reviews.review: Excelente juego, muy recomendable.

Honestly, game's fun to play when it's fair, but that's the base problem: half of the time the game's not fair. The game's still fun, but I really wish the following problems were to be fixed.

For starters I get that the game's supposed to look spooky and dark, but it's plain retarded that you limit brightness to a point where 3 survivors literally blend with the environment. The situation's so bad I literally had to pull the computer's gamma midway through a game to actually see survivors.

The maps look great, however half of them fall under one of two categories: either there's too much visual/auditory polution or the layout is atrocious. The first problem is easily fixed if the devs gave more than two sliders to adjust sound, as playing in the old west map and hearing the decorative birds going off is very distracting and anger inducing.

As for visual polution, this is more in the sense that there's either too much grass or maize and for that the devs simply have to make it so these entities disappear when you're close to them. There were scenarios where a Claudette simply stood still during a chase and I completely lost her (and the reverse happened also).

As for the second problem, with this meaning the layout, it's harder to fix as it goes into the category of map generation. Honestly, some maps such as Pyramid head's and The Demogorgon's really need a rework. I've lost myself multiple times trying to navigate them AS THE KILLER. What's happening right now is comparable to a minotaur loosing itself on it's own fucking labyrinth. Perhaps give some sort of way to better orient as the killer in shit maps.

The third category of problems is overall just killers. Usually playing survivor is easier since the only thing changing is the starting perks and the models, but with killers it's way different.
Some of the killers feel strong while others are complete garbage. Some of them, such as the trapper or the clown fall into a third category where they're good but their abilities are a detriment when there's killers with objectively better powers.

A quick rundown of Killers that need changes:

-Trapper: After a certain rank, he's too perk dependant to actually have time to set up traps and I just loose 4 gens in a row to set up traps. He's mechanically outmatched by the Hag, who although is slower it still has more map pressure since she doesn't have to walk half a map away to grab more traps. He only has a trap slot and should have two base trap slots. Another thing that would help greatly is having traps in more common places where they're usually put (i know this is asking a lot, but it's the main reason why I loose generators: having to walk half a map away to grab a non armed trap so I can put it somewhere else). It's also a huge pain to move traps from one place to another, as sometimes you take so long to set up traps there's no more generators in that side of the map.

-The Clown: Although the bottle mechanic is cool, the reload takes too much time.

-The Wraith: He literally doesn't have any map control and the speed that he receives from his invisibility doesn't make up for not being able to protect generators. Beyond that, to make up for his power, he has to use multiple perks to slow down the game just enough so he can be an M1 killer.

-The Nightmare: For the love of god, give him a directional lullaby. It's extremely disorienting to listen to it just to be surprised out of nowhere by a fucking midget, not to mention the lullaby and terror radius should have their rolls swapped (heartbeat on the dream and lullaby outside).


The ranking is also a problem. When I play as killer I either completely stomp the enemy team or get myself stomped. It's even worse so when I play as trapper or wraith due to previously mentioned problems. The problem goes further, as I in multiple occasions went against higher ranks or lower ranks in upwards of 10 ranks of difference, which is unheard of. It's comparable to a silver one in csgo going against a master elite.


The character overall are too pricey and there's no cost dropping. I understand you have a game to run and money to make, but it's very tiresome and unfun to have to grind 30 levels for a character to then be able to get his teachable perks on other characters.


Overall the game is a 6/10 and I'll recommend it, but would really like if these problems were fixed. All the problems make the game feel less appealing.

This game is great but there is a few things you first timers need to look out for
1.This game has no Ranked matchmaking so expect your first few games to be hard and quick.
2.Very toxic community, but don't let that scare you from buying the game because a lot of them are willing to give you tips post-match
3.BEWARE of facecampers
exelente

Lag:


O jogo não utiliza servidores própios, então em alguns lobbies voce verá o ping mais de 10^78 ms, e em outros, o ping estará bom, depois ruim, depois bom, e por fim da DC da sala durante o loading. Isso seria amenizado ou totalmente consertado com a chegada dos servers dedicados, mas como os devs estão cagand0 e andando, podem esperar sentados.
Durante a partida o lag, principalmente em ranks mais baixos pode significar a vitória ou a derrota para um player, normalemnte o beneficiado é o killer, mas não é regra. Após certo nível técnico, você passa a utilizar de mindgames de mindgames para conseguir jukar o killer, e depende de frações de segundo para estunar ele, ou caso contrario você cai. é horrivel. Em casos extremos pode atrapalhar nas esquil checks, e ai meu caro, é só quitar da partida.
.
Loading simulator:

Esse jogo é praticamente um simulador de carregamento, tem loading pra tudo, tem loading pra carregar o loading, loading pra você começar esperar a procura de uma sala, loading até pra dar quit do jogo. Se você não curte esperar 10 minutos para achar uma partida, vai se estressar muitas vezes nessa porcaria. Vou citar exemplo: quando tu quer jogar de killer, dependendo do horario escolhido, são 10 minutos de fila, entra 4 pessoas na sala, porém 2 delas lagadas, elas saem, entra mais 2, 1 minuto pro jogo começar. Começa o loading que varia de 20 segundos a 2 minutos ( quanto mais demora maior a chance de ser necessario repetir os passos anteriores pois um player deu DC e a partida é cancelada). Jogo começa os cara vê que tu ta usando memento ja quita 2, os outros vc mata em 2 min de jogo, e pronto, vc jogou 3 minutos e ficou 15 na fila, repita o processo.
De survivor é  mais simples se estiver jogando sozinho, porém acompanhado o negocio fica tenso: tu cria a sala, invita seu amigo, da um loading que te joga pra uma sala com 2 aleatórios, ping fica 5 milhões tu quita da lobby, cria outra sala e assim vai... normalmente vai umas 3 vezes pra tu achar uma sala com ping aceitável.
Algumas vezes a sala buga, e fica faltando um player, esse maldito fica preso no limbo, o pior é a sua esperança de chegar o ultimo player, mas ele nunca chega, vou passa a dica: se faltar 1 player na sala, pode sair e procurar outra que vai mais rápido.
Um sistema de grupos foi prometido, mas é o mesmo esquema dos servidores, então...


Bugs

Bem esse jogo deveria se chamar dead by bugs, porque o que essa p0ra tem é bug, tem de todo tipo e toda forma que você pensar, tudo pode acontecer... inclusive a sala pode bugar tanto que não ocorre nenhum bug na partida (casos raros) 


Reclamações:

neste jogo o choro é comum. Algumas taticas permitidas pelo jogo em si, são totalmente repudiadas pela comunidade em geral, geralmente essas taticas são "estratégias" do killer.

a maioria das reclamaçoes vem por parte dos survivors, pois eles são em maior parte os mais afetados por este tipo de conduta.

O jogo é bom, bem divertido, recomendo a todos que estão em dúvida que adquiram esta maravilha!
Bom

This game is a lot of fun when you first get it. Playing as killer is very satisfying, at first. Playing Survivor can be very tense and heart pounding, at first. And while I do very much enjoy playing this game, after leveling in the ranks, it gets much, MUCH less fun.

     When it comes to playing as the Killer (Which I play as most of the time), you can have a lot of fun chasing and hitting people, hell even getting stunned isn't too bad cause you've managed to hit them. But unless you get really good at killer, and I mean REALLY good, you're gonna be losing a lot of games and getting very few kills. Sure maybe every so often you'll get a game where you dominate everyone, but as you rank up, you'll get games like that much less often. Unless you main the Nurse who takes a lot of time to get passable at, you're gonna lose, a lot. 

     When it came to playing survivor (which I don't play often and don't really have much to say), you're just going to go through the same things over and over again until you either; get really good, some how get high enough rank that everyone else dominates the Killer, or stay low rank and just keep repairing and dying. The objectives are always the same and the maps change slight from time to time, and every Killer and player is( mostly) different, but all Killers have to suffer through the same few choices that more often than naught end up with them losing time and ground on a survivor. 

     It is true that this game can be very fun, but it's also true it can be VERY frustrating. A number of killers in the higher ranks really only get kills after downing one person and camping them, AFTER all generators are finished and the exits are open. Then the killer has to pray to god the survivors don't all go to save the one on the hook, and if they do, you can kiss that kill good-bye unless you got an instant down. 

    Perhaps one of the saddest parts about this game is that it will go through 'dark' times. The Dark times are when the game is really bad and very unbalanced, and this happens from time to time with certain changes or buffs/ nerfs. Freddy Krueger was incredibly bad for the longest time and was only recently changed to be a decent killer. One of the biggest Killer Perks (Hex: Ruin) is still the most used Killer perk because without it, the generators get done WAY to fast.

    Finally, it really just comes down to you, the player. Everyone will think differently about this game, yes. But really it's up to you to decide if this game will be worth your time, and a lot of your money since a lot of the killers and survivors are locked behind pay walls. I bought every killer and almost every survivor and I do honestly have fun with this game, but it can get very frustrating to play, to the point you may just stop playing for a few months so the ranks can reset and you can play against low ranking people again, which I'm gonna do for now so I can have fun in 1-2 months with this game.

Jest wiele powodów dla których mógłbym tę grę wyrzucić do kosza. Przykładem tego mogą być :

- Bugi / notorycznie pojawiające się z każdym nowym Patchem (niektóre nawet mają już po 2 lata, a wciąż mimo naprawiania, nadal się pojawiają),
- Toksyczne community / Każdy od każdego chce być lepszy. Ocalali żyją w przekonaniu, że im się należy "przeżyć", a Zabójcom, że muszą zabić całą czwórkę inaczej są "słabi"
- Ciągłe problemy z łączem (ping) z racji tego, że najczęściej hostem jest zabójca. Tak, jest to gra peer to peer.
- Nadużywanie cheat'ów, lag-switchów i innych cudawianek by utrudnić grę drugiej stronie.
- Często niepotrzebne nerfy, które nie mają aż tak ogromnego wpływu na rozgrywkę. 
- i wiele innych.

Gra oczywiście posiada również plusy, bo nikt nie powiedział, że gra jest beznadziejna - świadczyć o tym może moje ponad 3,000 godzin. 

+ Świetny Design postaci ocalałych jak i zabójców. W grze znaleźć można wiele licencjonowanych postaci jak np: Myers (Halloween), Freddy Krueger ( Koszmar z Ulicy Wiązów) itp.
+ Ciekawa rozgrywka (ze strony ocalałych po dłuższym czasie może być monotonna, ale ze strony zabójcy jest to czasem nie lada wyzwanie),
+ Jest to póki co jedyna gra o takiej rozgrywce - Mowa tutaj o rozgrywce asymetrycznej. 4 ocalałych vs 1 Zabójca,
+ Ciuszki, ciuszki i jeszcze raz ciuszki :)
+ wiele innych.

Jeśli ktoś by mnie spytał teraz czy warto w tę grę grać - to śmiało odpowiem : Tak. Jest wciągająca, ma w sobie to coś, co przyciąga Twoją uwagę i można zagrać ze znajomymi - jeśli ktoś szuka gry w którą mógłby zagrać z innymi. Gra daje wiele możliwości i są to dobrze zainwestowane pieniądze jak i czas. :)

Fiyat performans olarak değerlendirirsek kesinlikle oynamanız gereken bir oyun. Özellikle arkadaşlarla oynayınca çok keyifli. Eğer tek başladıysanız da topluluktan birileriyle oyun içinde tanışıp o insanlara katılabilirsiniz. Oyun korku oyunu olarak sunuluyor fakat içerisinde komedi, heyecan, gerilim herşeyi barındırıyor. Ufak tefek bugları tabi ki var her oyunda olduğu gibi ama firma oyunu geliştirmek için gerçekten iyi çalışıyor. Kesinlikle tavsiye ederim.
Bom jogo para jogar em uma madrugada com os amigos.

Игра безумно крутая . Геймлей отличный . Разработчики стараются над выходом нового контента . Мне очень понравился реворк кошмара , я считаю , что он должен был быть таким изначально . Но хочу обратиться к разработчикам . Вы сделали так , что когда во время загрузки игрок отключается , игра отменяется . Вы понимаете как сложно найти игру за маньяка . Исправьте это пожалуйста . И ещё , бывает что после матча выскакивает предложение ошибка обновления ранга . Я только что сыграл игру и у меня произошла такая проблема , у меня был 8 ранг , а стал 9 , и тогда у меня реально пригорело.  Исправьте это пожалуйста . Ну и конечно же я жду летнего ивента , по типу того , который был прошлым летом .

Die Community ist grauenhaft da jeder 2te einen beleidigt oder ohne grund das spiel verlässt.

Самый честный обзор на DBD*
Игра интересная, но обладает очень токсичным комьюнити. За каждое ваше действие вас могут зафейскемпить или напресидается перед вашим лицом столько, что вы заходите удалить эту игру и забыть о ней.
Чтобы по настоящему играть в эту игру в своё удовольствие вам стоит игра только за одного маньяка-Канибал(Бубба). Этот маньяк является самым имбовым маньяком в игре. Когда он вешает вас на крюк то вам только и остается молиться всем богам которых вы знаете чтобы у него вылетел интернет, либо чтобы вы спрыгнули с крюка.

Не очень хорошая реализация хорошего, проверенного временем сюжета. Маньяк и четыре жертвы, казалось бы что можно испортить или привнести нового? Разработчики справились с реализацией не плохого геймплея, но не справились с движком игры из-за чего практически с каждым обновлением игра становится все более забаганой и не пригодной к комфортной игре, постоянные ошибки на стороне сервера и длительные поиски маньяков и сурвов в лобби. Все это формирует мнение не очень успешного проекта с хорошей идеей, но абсолютной халтурой со стороны разработчиков. Конечно главным и самым весомым плюсом для меня - это отсутствие аналогов и уникальные сотрудничества с крупными кинокомпаниями, что дает возможность им добавлять культовых маньяков из популярных фильмов 70-80х. На этом плюсы для меня заканчиваются. Переставать играть я конечно не собираюсь, т.к. писал ранее - аналогов нет! Определенно рекомендую любителям БДСМ...таким как я)

This game... ohhhhh this game....
Ive played this game on ps4 when it fist came out. This game has gone to complete shit. I play as a survivor main and have quickly come to realize after i bought this for pc, that the killers are super broken. This game has become people waiting 20 mins to be the killer because it is pretty much the only way to get decent blood points anymore. I can que as a survivor and get in with seconds! This is because the demand for us is sooooo high. The reason for this? Well everything is literally against you as a survivor. The killer gets first look at you before you even start the game. Oh you brought a flashlight? Not gonna play wraith or any other killer that can be blinded easily. Oh you brought toolboxes? Okay now ill run hex: ruin and youll spend 10 mins between finding the totem and the killer protecting it with their dear life. Should we get started on hitboxes?? When i first played this if you were halfway over a pallet you were golden and had time to find the next loop to stall the killer for your team. Nowadays? Ive been hit multiple times as my feet hit the other side of the pallet! The killer has a longer weapon? Stand 4 feet from a window and get smacked. Try to 360 the killer to avoid a hit? Get smacked literally every time you try. The vanilla killers can somehow still be countered, but any of the dlc killers become so broken that nobody wants to play as a survivor. Ive never seen so many people DC just from seeing a certain killer, AKA ghostface or the new freddy. With ghostface, seriously, give me the chance to reveal him? oh by the way this gives him the exact direction you are looking at him from. Ice queen cant be heard until she is literally stomping your face in on the gen. Legion hits one person and can now see every person within what seems like 50 city blocks of the person he hit. Leatherface has a chainsaw that takes what feels like 10 mins to stop reving and wildly swinging at you, oh plus it gets a significant speed boost, youll never use a tree to get away from this 10 foot wide hitbox. Once you reach rank 15, youve now found everyone playing myers with unlimited level 3 1 hits. By the time you notice hes looking at you its already to late. I guess most people will try and defend these things by saying "well theres perks to counter this stuff". Well HOW AM I SUPPOSED TO CHOSE 4 PERKS OUT OF 30! It seems each perk is made to run against certain killers. Guess i could run small game for the 3 games a year i run against a trapper and hag, or i could put on spine chill to realize myers and ghostface are stalking me. Plus run self care, because if you bring a med kit youll always end up gettin hit with franklins and lose it on the ground. Hmmm this leaves us with 1 perk slot left... chose between balanced landing, ds, adrenaline, urban evasion, dead hard, and many more. Most of these come with a lovely cooldown of about 60 seconds. Great, use it one time and now your still getting chased because you dont have room to run featherlight to remove your scratch marks by 3 seconds. All and all i loved playing this game when i played on ps4. The buffing of every killer needs to stop. If the devs ever want people to stay playing this game they should focus on the part of it where 4 people play, and not the single person. Your a killer, you already have the advantage of being able to damage somebody. This game tends to feel like survivors are bunny rabbits, and the killers and hunters who instead of using their regular rifle to take us out, use a bazooka and trip mines. All while being cornered helpless clinging onto their one perk that helps them get a 1 second lead, the survivors are always doomed. Oh wait, they have a hatch you can escape from? Wait wait wait.... lets add a timer for the last rodent so instead of secretly moving around the map, they cant sprint to a door and take a year to open it with no one else there to distract the killer. Oh and lets put 2 doors on the map and slam them 20 feet from each other so the killer has an easier time walking between them to find the last rat alive. Bottom line is if you decide to get this game, play as a killer, you cant go wrong. The devs will make sure you can get a 4k. Maybe one day this entire game will be 5 killers all staring at each other in coldwind farm wondering WHERE THE HELL THE SURVIVORS HAVE ALL GONE. Rant over. 10/10 wouldnt recommend for anyone to pay even the cheap $10 to try this game.

As it is, I cannot recommend this game.

I got it back when it was fresh out of beta, and it was a broken mess. But at least it was fun.

Now, in some ways, this game is still a broken mess. As old bugs and problems were patched many new ones cropped up, and some of these still have yet to be addressed. And nowadays, this game isn't really fun.

This game has become a grind-fest full of toxicity and imbalance.

I get that developing a game is hard, and an asymmetrical game even harder, but really.

Buggy, unbalanced, and absolute brimming with the most vile type of people. It puts me in the mindset of old school CoD, with the screaming squeakers and constant "ur moms" in the chat.

I really can't go into further detail. I'm sorry but this game is no longer anything good. It leaves a foul taste in my mouth and makes me sick at my stomach every time I play a match.

Get ready for: ridiculously long queue times, toxic behavior, toxic behavior as PUNISHMENT for other toxic behavior, getting camped, getting tunneled, getting gen-rushed, getting looped, getting bullied and harrassed, being insulted, huge waves of hypocrisy, SWF cancer, facecamping, bugs, and literally a hundred other reasons that this game will do you more harm than good. Save your money.

bugi ...

Well, after 1400+ hours, time for a review.
So the game itself is really... really... really fun. Both as a Survivor and a Killer. I play both and it's equally fun. 
The issue for some may be (and it's no surprise) the community. You may come across awesome people that'll congratulate you for winning, be it Killer or Survivor. Hell, you'll even make friends here. Made some great friends from this game myself. But other times, you'll come across snotty, entitled Survivors that follow the ''Survivor Rule Book for Killers'' way too much or just act toxic for the sake of acting toxic. You'll get called pointless stuff like camper, tunneler, slugger, trash Killer, yada yada. As if a Killer's mission is not to gain an advantage if things get sour or not. Cos they want everything served on a silver platter. I play both Survivor and Killer and I'm ok with the outcome, as long as I get some Bloodpoints. Cos that's pretty much the game's purpose. Survive for as long as possible, get as many Bloodpoints as you can, level up, job's done.

BUT

If you get past these sorts of entitled individuals that hate the Killer for killing(even if most of 'em are toxic, entitled bullies), Dead by Daylight is a great deal of fun, especially with friends. Will you get frustrated ? Eh, kind of. Mostly when you have an Archive mission you wanna get done. But other than that, win or lose, just have fun in the end. If you don't win, there's always another opportunity.
I recommend DbD. ESPECIALLY since you can play as some iconic Horror villains, a few examples being Michael Myers from Halloween and the Demogorgon from Stranger Things. So if you're  a fan of these characters, this game is for you.

Good luck and have fun, folks. See you in The Fog.
